R0045.title: Points Theft
R0045.definition: Misappropriating non-monetary benefits from a stolen payment card or another user's account.
R0045.description: Using stolen payment card or account login credentials and payment information to misappropriate or steal non-monetary benefits. Login credentials come from carding attacks (R0040), and payment information comes from card cracking (R0041).
R0045.influence: Non-monetary benefits in the payment card or account are misappropriated or stolen.

references.title: Beware of Third-Party Channels for Credit Card Points Redemption â€” Don't Lose Big Trying to Save Small
Li Chen's Mileage Card Fraudulently Used by Over Ten People

R0045-001.title: Points Redemption Reselling
R0045-001.definition: An illegal profit-making scheme that uses other people's points for personal gain.
R0045-001.description: Fraudsters obtain other people's points through various means, then use those points for redemptions, and resell the redeemed gifts or services for profit.
R0045-001.influence: Disrupts market order and infringes on consumer rights.

references.title: Beware of Third-Party Channels for Credit Card Points Redemption
Li Chen's Mileage Card Fraudulently Used by Over Ten People
